{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aerohive |model=BR200 |revision=-WP |upc=700580841344 |asin=B009G1W0SO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |fcc_date=02/15/2012 |fcc_id=WBV-BR200-WP |ic_id=7774A-BR200WP |pcb_id=2976399806 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P1011 |cpu1_cspeed=667 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F512M29EWH |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, J2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9380 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 128K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C128;;1;,,, 4-Pin Phototransistor Photocoupler;Everlight;EL3H7;;4;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, Low Voltage CMOS Quad 2-Input AND Gate;Fairchild;74LCX08;;1;,,, 6-Pin DIP Schmitt Trigger Output Optocoupler;Fairchild;H11L1M;;2;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIe USB QPI & SATA;IDT;9FG104CGLF;;1;,,, Micropower Supply Voltage Supervisor;Texas Instruments;TLC7701;;1;,,, 802.3at Int. PoE-PD Interface and PWM Controller;STMicro;PM8803;;1;,,, Quad Integrated 802.3af PSE Controller/PMIC;Broadcom;BCM59103;;,,, Low Drop Power Schottky Rectifier;STMicro;STPS15L30C;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 6A, 24V Input Int. Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2106;;3;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-816;;2;,,, 5A, 200V N-Channel Mesh Overlay MOSFET;STMicro;STD5N20;;1;,,, 15A, 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3016S;;1;,,, 10.3A, 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3004S;;1;,,, 13A, 100V Fast Switching P-Channel MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFR5410;;1;,,, 1.5A Single Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2181D;;1;,,, 3A LDO Memory System Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51116;;1;,,, 3.3V Octal Transparent D-Type Latch w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVTH373;;2; |flags=enterprise class, PoE Switch, TPM |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.85.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=aerohive |oui=F0:9C:E9 |oui_eth=F0:9C:E9 }} {{TagLine|BR200 Branch Router}} :[http://www.aerohive.com/products/routers/br200 Product page] The BR200 series also includes the BR200 (non-wireless) â€¢ [https://idency.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Aerohive_Datasheet_BR200-WP.pdf Datasheet] "2976399802" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos in the original filing.
"2976399805" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos in the CII PC made 11/02/2012. :The newer model features a barrel plug power connector and apparently a new USB IC.. :and an Intel Flash chip is also visible. "2976399901" appears to be silkscreened on the wireless module. :The wireless module is also using three [[SiGe]] SE2595L front-ends. *[http://www.peppm.org/Products/aerohive/price.pdf Price effective Aug 2012 at peppm.org is $559.20] for the AH-BR200WP-N-FCC submodel {{WiFiCert|WFA14605|02/29/2012}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 ''PowerPC'' (@667MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB (Parallel NOR) Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2x w/ 802.3af PoE *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9380 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host port *Expansion: 1x Mini PCIe (used by WiFi) *Power: 48V, 1.25A via barrel ==Images== File:BR200-WP Top.jpeg|Board Top File:BR200-WP Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:BR200-WP Internal view.jpeg|Internal View [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
